item.title: Chartered Engineer (CEng)
item.description: Chartered Engineer (CEng) The Engineering Council (EC) defines a Chartered Engineer (CEng) as someone who: “develops solutions to engineering problems using new or existing technologies, through innovation, creativity and change and may be accountable for complex systems with significant levels of risk”

item.title: Incorporated Engineer (IEng)
item.description: Incorporated Engineer (IEng) The Engineering Council (EC) defines an Incorporated Engineer (IEng) as: “*someone who â€˜maintains and manages applications of current and developing technology, and may undertake engineering design, development, manufacture, construction and operation.
